creator: geoffrey@4thpass.com
text:
There is a need for an HTTP Regex Post Processor for HTTP Response Headers.  
Some systems return session data in the HTTP response headers, and it would be 
helpful if JMeter could capture this information to a variable using a regular 
expression.

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
The Regex extractor in branch 2.0 now has radio buttons to select either body 
or headers
